sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Set Time to next step field for custom escalation to 15 minutes as default</description> <name>Time to next step default value</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var dictionaryGR = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary'); dictionaryGR.addQuery('name', 'cmn_rota_esc_step_def'); dictionaryGR.addQuery('element', 'time_to_next_step'); dictionaryGR.setLimit(1); dictionaryGR.query(); if (dictionaryGR.next()) { dictionaryGR.default_value = '00:15:00'; dictionaryGR.setWorkflow(false); //turn off workflow so cache is not flushed each time dictionaryGR.update(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-03-16 07:32:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ab5b926a532d2110d0d4ddeeff7b1257</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Time to next step default value</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="On-Call Scheduling" source="com.snc.on_call_rotation">4bca78ec3cf1311068bcf327dfe37f86</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_ab5b926a532d2110d0d4ddeeff7b1257</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-03-16 07:32:02</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Time to next step default value
